episodes.title: Former Cult Member Speaks Out: Isolation, Arranged Marriage & Gov Interference
episodes.description:
Word of Faith Fellowship is a Protestant non-denominational church in Spindale, North Carolina. Many former members have shared their experience and say it is a cult. Word of Faith is run by Jane Whaley.

⭐️Fair Use Disclaimer:

9:09 Moving Children out of their Homes

17:38 The Lower Building and Isolation

23:30 Why Has the Church Not Been Thoroughly Investigated
28:00 Cheating at Church School
30:40 College & Breakaway
32:00 Arranged Marriages & The Relationship Class
36:30 Reconnecting with his sister
38:20 How His Parents Got Involved in WoFF
42:15 Daily Involvement in Church
45:00 Woman Run Church
46:35 The Unofficial Rulebook
51:25 Jane is 80ish… what happens after Jane

episodes.title: CHURCH OR CULT: WORD OF FAITH FELLOWSHIP?
episodes.description:
Word of Faith Fellowship is a Protestant non-denominational church in Spindale, North Carolina. It has been the subject of several allegations describing it as a cult and accusing it of abuse. I am covering some of those allegations and the church's response!
